data.title: Östersund Villa Vacation Rentals - Jamtland County, Sweden
data.meta_description: Find the perfect villa rental for your trip to Östersund. Private villa rentals, luxury villa rentals, villa rentals with a pool, and villa rentals with a hot tub. Find and book unique villas on Airbnb.
data.text:
Villa in Odensala

4.67 out of 5 average rating, 3 reviews4.67 (3)

Newly built villa 6 km from ski stadium

New and fresh villa located 6 km from the ski stadium for rent two weeks during the World Junior World Cup in biathlon. The villa has consistently high standards and a pleasant level of light and open floor plan between living room and the fully equipped kitchen downstairs. At the front there is a sun-proof terrace with extra dining area. In total there are two toilet/shower and upstairs you will find four bedrooms of which two with double bed. The villa is located about 10 minutes from ICA and good pizzeria. No smoking and not pets.

Villa in Vemdalsskalet

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 41 reviews4.95 (41)

Fjällidyll with ski-in/ski-out

Newly built lodge spring house with ski in/ski out in sun location and scenic views. Log house with rustic wooden floor, exclusive interior from Artwood and stunning sauna/relaxation area. Five bedrooms, with hotel beds from the Villa Dagmar/Hotel Diplomat. Open floor plan, 5m ceiling height, generous living areas & fireplaces. Spacious entrance for skiing and undressing ski clothes. 3 x smart tv. Cross-country trails and hiking trails next to the house. Walking distance to grocery store, ski rental, restaurants, apres ski etc.

Villa in Odenslund-Odenskog

5 out of 5 average rating, 4 reviews5 (4)

City Near Villa in Östersund

Welcome to our cosy house just outside the city center! A lovely walk along Storsjön takes you into the city or you can easily hop on the bus - several bus stops can be found nearby. Grocery store, Storsjöbadet, trotting and Multichallenge are all a stone's throw away, as well as well-liked “Reminded” with all its swimming areas, walking paths and running tracks. Close to both the football fields used during Storsjöcupen and the stadium where the ski lodge is kept. Please note: pool only summer time.

Villa in Bjärme

5 out of 5 average rating, 7 reviews5 (7)

Villa with quiet tranquility and proximity to nature.

Placed in the beautiful landscapes you'll find Bjärme lined up by forests and open fields with lakes and mountains just a wistful glance away. Perfect stay for vacations, nature exploring or relaxing retreat. The house has a modern Scandinavian feel to it and in the forest and in the surroundings there is a lot to discover and excursions to do. There are several nature reserves and hiking trails. During our winters you have the chance to watch the Northern lights illuminate the sky above you.

Villa in Frösön

5 out of 5 average rating, 6 reviews5 (6)

Idyllic villa close to Östersund city

The villa is close to the lake, forest, has fantastic views, and only 5 min drive by car or buss to Östersund. The villa is rural with 2 hectares of land where hens and sheeps lives. Pick some fresh eggs from the hen-house for breakfast and make a fire in any of the five fireplaces in the house! Why not borrow our bikes to city or skis to ski on the ice at winter. Our place if perfect for families, business travelers, event-guests and of course your pet is alloud to join. Feel free to ask!

Villa in Bräcke

5 out of 5 average rating, 16 reviews5 (16)

House in Bräcke at St Olavsleden near Gimån

The entire downstairs with its own entrance in the house at St Olavsleden! 700 meters to Bräcke center where there are ICA, Coop, Systembolaget, pharmacy, pizzerias, restaurants, Sweden's award-winning ice cream bar,. 700 meters to Folkets Hus where there is a library and free wifi. 200 meters from Revsundsjön with good fishing. 5 km to beach with sandy beach. 9 minutes drive to Gimån with one of Sweden's best trout fishing. 50 min to Östersund.

Villa in Gällö

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 25 reviews4.92 (25)

House with a nice view over Revsundssjön

Relax with the whole family in this peaceful home where you have the entire house except the garage. It is walking distance to various exercise trails, downhill slope, grocery store and there is a gas station at the place. Three km to the Ski Tunnel Midsweden 365, St. Olavsleden goes past Gällö and the beautiful Forsaleden is nearby. The property is undisturbed overlooking Revsund Lake and the forest behind.

Villa in Undersåker

4.9 out of 5 average rating, 10 reviews4.9 (10)

Villa just outside Åre with electricity+fire heated hottub

Newly built house 13 minutes from Åre Centrum and 5 minutes from Trillevallen. Quiet and lovely with close to mountains. 180 sqm house with two lofts. There are beds for 7 persons. 3 beds are open at the loft. 4 Beds in closed rooms. The house sits on its own with a few neighbors nearby and with close access to snowmobile trails and forest roads for walking or skiing.

Villa in Slandrom

4.77 out of 5 average rating, 26 reviews4.77 (26)

Villa 10 min from Östersund

The house is located about 10 minutes drive from the center of Östersund overlooking Storsjön, Frösön and Östersund. It consists of 3 bedrooms, living room, kitchen and dining area. 2 toilets with shower are available. Furnished glassed-in patio with exit directly to a lawn with no insight. Barbecue available.

Villa in Lugnvik

5 out of 5 average rating, 4 reviews5 (4)

Villa with large patio in Lugnvik

Welcome to our nice villa in Lugnvik with 4 km to the center of Östersund and 3,5 km to the ski stadium. Single level villa with open plan. Quiet area with good parking facilities both on the farm or after the street.
